text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Marvelooous☆ Summer Training Camp is Marvelous, don't you think?★ Mister Sun seems happy! Seems like something good will happen!!
And with that in mind, we were doing well during this year's summer training camp. However――

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Haa, training camp is fine but……out in the countryside, there aren't too many places to have fun, huh……

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: You said it~, I can't help but think……that it might be a bit more fun if there were some shops at least~.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume C
text_block_list.text: Signal's weak too, so I'm really bored……

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Marvelous☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: There's Marvelous things all over the place, you know! Like, that beach house!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: A tasty, salt-flavored yakisoba is good too, but the inner tubes you can borrow for free as a Tracen Academy student are what I'd recommend!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: If it's now, then you might be able to see some tropical fish depending on the tides☆ Being able to just float around and find pretty fish is Marvelous too★

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: Oooh~, so there are tropical fish, huh~?! I kind of want to see them~!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: And then, and then, if you walk a little bit――

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Seems like there's a really pretty stream!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Rumor has it, that this river has a king! If we were able to see it, it'd be very Marvelous!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume C
text_block_list.text: A king!? If we got a picture of it, I bet it'd create quite a buzz!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: See! Marvelous is everywhere all around us☆

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Oooh~, so there was all that nearby. I had no idea. During our next break, let's go take a look! Thanks, Marvelous-san!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: You're welcome! Rather than being bored, going and having fun is Marvelous after all☆
As usual, Marvelous Sunday's positive attitude was wonderful. It only took a moment to change the other students' outlook to a positive one.
However, since we're at Summer Training Camp, I wonder if we could find something more special――no, Marvelous, to enjoy.
choice_data_list: ……I should try to find something too
……I should try to find something too

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Is something wrong? Your eyebrows are all scrunched up. Worried about something?
choice_data_list: I'm fine. Nothing to worry about!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: I see☆ …………
And so, to make the Summer Training Camp more Marvelous, I started searching for something fun nearby――
I wandered every which way to ask questions and get information. I wanted those girls to have a Marvelous experience――
As if in response to that feeling, I had found something. A festival held once every 5 years in the next town. It was certain to be Marvelous!
I was sure Marvelous Sunday and the others would be overjoyed! I needed to relay this information ASAP so we could make preparations to go!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Waaiii~! Welcome back☆★☆ Everyone here's ready to go, Trainer!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Oooooh~ Ahahahaha! So this is the Marvelous that Trainer made☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Yep yep! I knew Trainer could do it! Because Trainer and me think alike, after all☆

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: That's why I had everyone start getting ready~!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Trainer is Marvelous so, for sure, you'd find something incredibly Marvelous, is what I told them☆★
『If I hadn't done that, what would you have done……?』
『If I hadn't done that, what would you have done……?』
I'm sure the old me would have asked something like that. But weirdly, those weren't the words that came out. Instead――

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Yeah! Rather than one person's, it's both of our Marvelous☆
And so we all head to the next town, waiting on the footpath for the festival floats to come.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: Ah……I think I hear something. I wonder if they're here now?

text_block_list.name: Float-bearers
text_block_list.text: Waashoi! Waashoi!!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume C
text_block_list.text: Ahahahaa! This is great! It's flashier than I imagined! This'll cause a buzz~!!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: It will! It's Marvelous! Marvelous☆ Marvelous★
After that, we followed the floats in high spirits, eventually arriving at the Summer Festival venue.

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume A
text_block_list.text: To think the floats would be that heavy! They let me try pulling it but, doing it by myself was pretty hard~.

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Being able to move it by yourself is Marvelous☆ Let's see if they'll let us all pull it together afterwards!

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume B
text_block_list.text: After this, sounds like they're going to do something with fireworks on them! Hand-held fireworks! I guess they're fireworks you carry in your hands or something~!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Ooooh~ so there's fireworks like that! Being able to hold them in your hands, it sounds very Marvelous☆

text_block_list.name: Uma Musume C
text_block_list.text: Ah, sounds like it's starting soon! Let's all go take a look!

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Ahahahahaa! Everyone's Marvelous, huh☆ More than usual, much much more, a happy Marvelous★

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: As I thought, rather than with just one person, with two――
choice_data_list: With two of us it's better――

text_block_list.name: Marvelous Sunday
text_block_list.text: Marvelous☆★☆
It was easy to make the world sparkle. Not alone, but together―― with just that……the world would become more Marvelous.
In order to spread Marvelous around the world, I would continue to work together with her!
